chat_room.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • chat_room.server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class Server
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Accepts clients to the chat room and creates a singleClientHandler for each in order to read messages from each one and then broadcast to all clients in the chat room
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
